# aturi.to Fork Template

This repository is a template for creating your own custom ATProto link sharing service.

## What gets customized when you use this template:

- âœ… Domain name
- âœ… Site branding and metadata
- âœ… Author/creator attribution
- âœ… Platform waypoints
- âœ… Colors and styling

## Quick Setup

After creating a new repository from this template:

1. Clone your new repository
2. Run `npm run setup-fork` for guided setup
3. Customize waypoints and branding as needed
4. Deploy to Vercel

See [FORKING.md](FORKING.md) for detailed instructions.
